resources.string: Connect to multiple SenseMe cubes via Bluetooth (not BLE). The app receives messages from the SenseMe cubes. Depending on the message, it will produce the right note for that instrument. 1. Click on the "Bluetooth" icon on the top right to get a list of device, press "scan for devices" to discover more. 2. Click on the name of the SenseMe cube to make a connection. 3. Tilt the SenseMe cube to start transmitting characters to the phone.
